title: TI-Basic Developer
summary: TI-Basic Developer is a wiki site for programming TI calculators. I had contributed heavily to this site, adding not just content but new functionality.
long_summary: TI-Basic Developer is a wiki site for programming TI calculators. I had contributed heavily to this site, adding not just content but new functionality. This website is honestly hugely responsible for making me the programmer that I am today.

gallery.caption: The site hosts a number of games written by various programmers
